Category:Finger items

Clothing Jewelry

Helms
Gloves
Cloaks
Belts
Boots
Bracers
Goggles
Necklaces
Rings
Trinkets

Rings, bands etc.

Rings can be worn on your finger. You are able to wear one ring on each hand (so 2 total). They can be enchanted randomly with one of the Clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below.


Item Special Abilities ML Bind Quest Chest
Acrobat's Ring
  • Striding +10%Striding +10%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 10% bonus to run speed.
  • Jump +7Jump +7: Passive: +7 Competence bonus to the Jump skill.
  • Tumble +7Tumble +7: Passive: +7 Competence bonus to the Tumble skill.
 3 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Lost Seekers
Ring of Dragon's Breath
  • Burning HandsBurning Hands
    Caster level: 1
    Charges: 3 (3/day)     — 3 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)
 None Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Seal of Shan-To-Kor
Sigil of Stormreach
  • Diplomacy +9Diplomacy +9: Passive: +9 Competence bonus to the Diplomacy skill.
  • Bluff +9Bluff +9: Passive: +9 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 7 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Free Delera End chest

  • Devotion +42Devotion +42: Passive: +42 Equipment bonus to Positive (Healing) Spell Power.

    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5

  • Spot +13Spot +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Spot skill.

  • Move Silently -10Move Silently -10: Passive: -10 penalty to the Move Silently skill.

Ring of the Silver Concord
  • Charisma +5 Charisma +5: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
  • Protection +4Protection +4: Passive: +4 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Command +4Command: Passive: +4 Insight bonus on Charisma based skill checks. Command armor and command shields make their owners very noticeable, imposing a -6 penalty on Hide checks.
  • Parrying +2Parrying +2: +2 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +2 Insight bonus to Saves.
  • Silver Concord's SubtletySilver Concord's Subtlety: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +10% Artifact bonus to Fortification Bypass
    +5 Artifact bonus to Melee and Ranged Power

Masei Mkembe sells for 625 Antique Bronze Tokens
Ring of Feathers
  • Feather FallingFeather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.
 None UnboundUnbound: This item is Unbound, and may take permanent damage. Halls of Shan-To-Kor end chest
Ring of Thelis
  • Efficient Metamagic - Empower IIEfficient Metamagic - Empower II: The additional spell point cost for using the Empower Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.
  • Wizardry VIIWizardry VII: This item grants the wearer +175 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.
  • Spell Resistance +22 Spell Resistance +22: +22 Enhancement bonus to Spell Resistance.

  • Attack Bonus +2Attack Bonus +2: Provides a +2 competence bonus to your attack rolls.
  • Dexterity +6 Dexterity +6: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

Ring of Lies
  • Charisma +6 Charisma +6: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
  • Diplomacy +10Diplomacy +10: Passive: +10 Competence bonus to the Diplomacy skill.
  • Bluff +10Bluff +10: Passive: +10 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.
  • Haggle +10Haggle +10: Passive: +10 Competence bonus to the Haggle skill.
  • Perform +10Perform +10: Passive: +10 Competence bonus to the Perform skill.
  • DeceptionDeception: This weapon is hard to focus upon and thus provides a +3 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, Deception weapons have a small chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.
  • Hidden Effect: Increases spellcasting, melee, and ranged threat by 15%
  • Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver)Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver): This item could be upgraded if you found a Seal of the Stormreaver to combine it with. Bring this item to the Stormreaver Monument in Gianthold and combine it with a Seal of the Stormreaver to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.

Ring of the Ravager
  • Strength +6 Strength +6: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Exceptional Strength +1Exceptional Strength +1: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Strength.
  • RavagerRavager: Chance to inflict damage over time effect (Ravager's Cut: 2d6 slashing damage vs creatures that can bleed on melee hit or glancing blow plus four rounds of additional damage. Does not work with handwraps.This is working as intended.)
  • Incredible PotentialIncredible Potential: Incredible Potential: This ring's power has not been fully unleashed. When this ring is combined with 9 Shavarath War Trophies and ac Imbued Shard of Great Power in an Altar of Subjugation, its full potential will be reveled.

Kormor's Ring
  • Intelligence +6 Intelligence +6: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
  • Confounding EnchantmentConfounding Enchantment: The shifting nature of the magic that enchants this ring makes the effect hard to determine.
    • Every time this ring is equipped, it gains one of the following until unequipped:
      • Exceptional Charisma +1Exceptional Charisma +1: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Charisma.
      • Exceptional Constitution +1Exceptional Constitution +1: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Constitution.
      • Exceptional Dexterity +1Exceptional Dexterity +1: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Dexterity.
      • Exceptional Intelligence +1Exceptional Intelligence +1: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Intelligence.
      • Exceptional Strength +1Exceptional Strength +1: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Strength.
      • Exceptional Wisdom +1Exceptional Wisdom +1: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Wisdom.
  • Wild MageWild Mage: Spell Penetration VIII: Your 8th level spells and spells lower than 8th level gain a +2 bonus to the die roll to penetrate the target's Spell resistance. (Non-stacking)

Ring of Unknown Origins
  • Proof Against Disease +6 Proof Against Disease +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).
  • Proof Against Poison +6 Proof Against Poison +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).
  • Intelligence +5 Intelligence +5: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
  • Charisma +5 Charisma +5: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

Omniscience
  • Heightened Awareness 4Heightened Awareness 4: This item helps you to quickly read situations with sharpness and clarity, allowing you to predict actions before they occur. You gain a +4 Insight bonus to AC.
  • Exceptional Resistance +2 (Reflex)Exceptional Resistance +2 (Reflex): Passive: +2 bonus to Reflex saves that stacks with all other bonuses except Exceptional Resistance +2 (Reflex)
  • Exceptional Fortification (+25%)Exceptional Fortification (+25%): This item produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a +25% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and the damage is instead rolled normally. This ability is considered an Insight bonus when determining stacking with other sources of fortification

    • Dexterity +7 Dexterity +7: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +7 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
    • Insightful Dexterity +2Insightful Dexterity +2: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +2 insight bonus to Dexterity.
    • Wisdom +7 Wisdom +7: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +7 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
    • Insightful Wisdom +2Insightful Wisdom +2: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +2 insight bonus to Wisdom.
  • Sneak Attack Bonus +5Sneak Attack Bonus +5: Provides a +5 to attack bonus and a +8 to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
  • Insightful Sneak Attack Bonus +3Insightful Sneak Attack Bonus +3: Provides a +3 Insight modifier to your attack bonus and a +5 Insight bonus to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
  • Improved Deception Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +5 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.
 21 Bound to Character on EquipBound to Character on Equip: This item is Bound to Character on Equip The House of Broken Chains Matron chest

  • See the item description page for details.

 11 Bound to Account on Acquire, ExclusiveBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire
This is an Exclusive item. You may only carry one at a time. 		Vaults of the Artificers from exchanged challenge rewards or upgraded from level 8 version
Seal of House Dun'Robar
  • One of the following:
    • Constitution +7 Constitution +7: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +7 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
    • Insightful Constitution +2Insightful Constitution +2: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +2 insight bonus to Constitution.
    • Strength +7 Strength +7: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +7 enhancement bonus to Strength.
    • Insightful Strength +2Insightful Strength +2: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +2 insight bonus to Strength.
  • Dodge +8% Dodge +8%: +8% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.
  • One of the following:
    • Insightful Combat Mastery +5Insightful Combat Mastery +5: +5 Insight bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.
    • Shatter +10Shatter +10: This effect gives a +10 enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Sunder and Improved Sunder attempts.
    • Stunning +10 Stunning +10: +10 Enhancement bonus to the DC of character's Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.
    • Vertigo +10 Vertigo +10: This effect gives a +10 Enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip and Improved Trip attempts.
    • Tendon Slice 10%Tendon Slice 10%: This effect gives a 10% chance to Hamstring the target for each attack that does damage.

Ring of the Stalker (Level 3)
  • Deception +2 Deception +2: +2 Enhancement bonus to hit and +3 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.
  • Seeker +3 Seeker +3: Provides a +3 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +3 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).

Ring of Shadows (Level 25)
  • Hide +20Hide +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Hide skill.
  • Move Silently +20Move Silently +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Move Silently skill.
  • Lesser DisplacementLesser Displacement: Equipping this item causes light to distort around you. Attacks from enemies have a 25% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)

Oathring
  • Charisma +6 Charisma +6: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
  • Proof Against Poison +6 Proof Against Poison +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).

    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2

    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11

    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57

    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action

    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

  • Improved Earthen GuardImproved Earthen Guard: When you are successfully attacked, there is a 15% chance that a Stone Skin will be cast on you.
  • Protection +10Protection +10: Passive: +10 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Diehard Diehard: If you are incapacitated while this item is equipped, it will automatically stabilize you as if you had the Diehard feat.
  • Holding OnHolding On: Your range of unconsciousness extends by 40 hitpoints.
  • Earthgrab GuardEarthgrab Guard: This item stores the implacable strength of the earth deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, calling on the earth to erupt from the ground and hold an enemy in place.

 18 Bound to Character on EquipBound to Character on Equip: This item is Bound to Character on Equip What Goes Up Jeweled Key chest, & End chest (Heroic Hard)
Epic Ring of Unknown Origins
  • Proof Against Disease +8 Proof Against Disease +8: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +8 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 9 + their Fortitude save).
  • Proof Against Poison +8 Proof Against Poison +8: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +8 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 9 + their Fortitude save).
  • Immunity to FearImmunity to Fear: The wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.
  • Blindness ImmunityBlindness Immunity: Grants its wearer immunity to blindness effects.
  • Whirlwind WardWhirlwind Ward: This effect renders you immune to being knocked down by an Air Elemental's whirlwind. However, it does not prevent you from being knocked back or away from touching the Air Elemental.
  • Upgradeable - Primary AugmentUpgradeable - Primary Augment: This item can be upgraded to contain a Yellow, Blue or Red (weapons and shields only) augment. Arraetrikos' Bane (level 15)
  • Fire Resistance +29Fire Resistance +29: Passive: +29 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Insightful Enchantment Save +2Insightful Enchantment Save +2: +2 Insight bonus to your saves versus enchantments
  • Insightful Proof Against Poison +2Insightful Proof Against Poison +2: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +2 Insight bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 3 + their Fortitude save).
  • Quality Proof Against Disease +1Quality Proof Against Disease +1: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +1 Quality bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 2 + their Fortitude save).

Iron Band
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Constitution +5 Constitution +5: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Constitution.

  • Wisdom +13 Wisdom +13: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +13 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
  • Quality Wisdom +3Quality Wisdom +3: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +3 quality bonus to Wisdom.
  • Spell Save +10 Spell Save +10: This item gives a +10 Resistance bonus to your saves versus spells.
  • Quality Will Save +3Quality Will Save +3: This item gives a +3 Quality bonus to your Will saves.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57

    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

  • Feather FallingFeather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.

  • Improved Deception Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +5 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. Clouded Dreams
  • Exceptional Universal Spell Lore +5%Exceptional Universal Spell Lore: 5% Exceptional bonus to Universal Spell Lore.
  • Exceptional Universal Spell Power +15Exceptional Universal Spell Power +15: Passive: +15 Exceptional bonus to Universal Spell Power.
  • Insightful Spell Focus Mastery +3Insightful Spell Focus Mastery +3: +3 Insight bonus to the DC of all spells.
  • Legendary Nightmare GuardLegendary Nightmare Guard: On being hit or missed, this item has a chance to attempt to fear your enemy, ripping the life from them as if they were struck with a Phantasmal Killer spell. Enemies must make a DC 100 Will save versus the Fear or a DC 100 Fortitude save versus Death or be slain. Even if they make their save versus Death, they may still be feared.
  • Mind DrainMind Drain: This item reduces your maximum spell points by 5% while equipped.
  • Will Save -2 Will Save -2: This item gives a -2 penalty to your Will saves.

  • Insightful Dexterity +6Insightful Dexterity +6: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +6 insight bonus to Dexterity.
  • Exceptional Nimble Skills Bonus +10Exceptional Nimble Skills Bonus: +10 Exceptional bonus to Balance, Hide, Move Silently, Open Lock and Tumble.

  • Deadly +11 Deadly +11: +11 Competence bonus to weapon damage.

    • Named: Category:Green augments

    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9

    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1

    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

    • 7 Pieces Equipped: +15 Artifact bonus to Melee and Ranged Power

Ik'thanor's Signet Ring
  • Lesser Arcane Augmentation IXLesser Arcane Augmentation IX: Increases the wearer's caster level when casting ninth level or lower sorcerer or wizard spells by one.
  • Lesser Divine Augmentation IXLesser Divine Augmentation IX: Increases the wearer's caster level when casting ninth level or lower Divine spells by one.
  • Alchemical ConservationAlchemical Conservation: This item modifies the user's energy expenditure in such a way that many abilities can be used more frequently than normal. You will gain +1 ki on every successful attack, and you will increase the number of Action Boosts, Turn Undead attempts, and Bard Songs you can use per rest by 1 each.
    These additional uses will only take effect after you rest.

  • Negative Energy Absorption - 50 Charges (Recharged/Day: 10)Negative Energy Absorption: This effect absorbs negative energy and energy drain effects.
  • Legendary Nightmare GuardLegendary Nightmare Guard: On being hit or missed, this item has a chance to attempt to fear your enemy, ripping the life from them as if they were struck with a Phantasmal Killer spell. Enemies must make a DC 100 Will save versus the Fear or a DC 100 Fortitude save versus Death or be slain. Even if they make their save versus Death, they may still be feared.

Enemy attacks have a 15% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

  • Legendary Stone GuardLegendary Stone Guard: This item is invested with the power of the earth. On being struck in melee, it has the chance to attempt to turn the target to stone, as the Flesh to Stone spell. A successful Fortitude save (DC 100) negates the effect.
  • Feather FallingFeather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.

Legendary Neglected Wedding Ring
  • Improved Deception +21Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +21 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.
  • Deadly +11 Deadly +11: +11 Competence bonus to weapon damage.
  • Quality Bluff +5Quality Bluff +5: Passive: +5 Quality bonus to the Bluff skill.
  • Freedom of MovementFreedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under the influence of magic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.

    • Named: Category:Green augments
